property.name: dampingFactor
property.description: The damping factor to be used in PageRank calculations

property.name: epsilon
property.description: When the change in PageRank is less than epsilon for all pages, the PageRank job will finish.

property.name: sigDigits
property.description: The number of significant digits to return for the PageRanks. Should probably equal the negative exponent of epsilon. E.g., for epsilon = 1E-10, sigDigits = 10.

property.name: inputPath
property.description: The path to use for input on the DFS

property.name: outputPath
property.description: The path to use for output on the DFS

property.name: convergedPath
property.description: The path to use for checking convergence on the DFS
